app.name: Store Catalog Mobile Backend for Bluemix
app.description:
The Store Catalog Mobile Backend is a template that demonstrates Mobile Services integration with API Connect, 
Cloudant NoSQL DB, and Object Storage services on Bluemix. The template exhibits common architectural design patterns 
that developers can use to model their backend on Bluemix for mobile applications.

services.name: Cloudant NoSQL Database
services.description: Massively scalable, secure, and continuously operational database
